entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quesnel
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:40 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -5.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Quesnel Airport 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -5.2°C
Pressure: 102.3 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.2°C
Wind: SSW 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with flurries. Risk of freezing rain this afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. A few rain showers beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain this evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to plus 4 by morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. High 7.
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then clearing. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
